content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava. May I have your name to get started with booking your appointment?
Thank you, Mrs. Parker. Could you please provide your address where you need electrical service?
Thank you. Could you please provide the street number and zip code as well? This helps us confirm your service area and availability.
Isn't Elm Street enough? It's right by the park. Everyone knows it.
I'm sorry, Mrs. Parker. In order to proceed, I need the exact street number and zip code. Can you please provide these details?
No, I don't see why that's necessary. Can you just send someone already?
Unfortunately, I must have your full address, including street number and zip code, to book your appointment and ensure our technician reaches you. Please provide these details when possible.
reason: Customer refused to give complete address.
